text: @MichaelSteele trump is totally different from INTELLIGENT PRESIDENTS he surrounds himself with LACKEYS & people DUMBER than himself if that's possible. People in his administration who have COVID-19 walked around & SAID NO MASK NO MASK. Even the Secret Service has been exposed & wonder WHY
